title: Print, "Cloud Robe (Kumo-Isho), No. 18", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Cloud Robe
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 18 / Kumo-Isho.
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves magenta; inner leaves deep purple.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Cloud Robe (Kumo-Isho), No. 18", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-72.
